title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in million euros for 10 number of Company Names.
The Market capitalization in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
There is a difference of 37282.07 between the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
